PrecisRemission of income tax as well as Canada Pension Plan and Employment Insurance premiums payable by employers and their workers on RELIEF PAYMENTS made following the ICE STORM which caused extended power failures and extensive damage in New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Ontario and Quebec in the month of January 1998.
